name: Algorithms
description: Understand the foundations of algorithm design and data management.

name: Algebra
description: Master the principles of algebra essential for computer science.

name: Math Analysis
description: Dive into the core concepts of mathematical analysis.

name: Operating Systems
description: Learn about the essential functions and components of operating systems.

name: Computer Architecture
description: Explore the structure and behavior of computer systems.

name: Office & Web
description: Learn essential office software and web technologies to enhance your productivity and web skills.

name: Written Expression
description: Develop your written communication skills, focusing on techniques for clear and effective expression.

name: Probability & Stats
description: Understand the fundamentals of probability and statistics, and how to apply them in various contexts.

name: Math Logic
description: Explore the principles of mathematical logic, including reasoning, proof techniques, and logical structures.
